login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Sign in to your account to start game streaming

register.title: Create Account
register.subtitle: Register a new account to start using Remote Play
register.usernameHint: Only letters, numbers, and underscores. At least 3 characters.
register.failureDescription: Registration failed, please try again later
register.usernameFormatErrorDescription: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
register.usernameTooShortDescription: Username must be at least 3 characters
register.passwordTooShortDescription: Password must be at least 8 characters

logout.title: Logged Out
logout.description: You have safely logged out of your account

gamepad.disconnectedToastDescription: {{name}} has been disconnected from the app

addConsole.title: Add a console
addConsole.description: Enable remote features on your console to connect
addConsole.toastDescription: Please enable remote play features on your PlayStation console

console.reorderModeEnabledDescription: Drag cards to rearrange them. Click the edit icon again when finished.
console.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove the bound console {{name}}? This will not affect the console itself.
console.deleteSuccessDescription: {{name}} has been removed from your bound devices.
console.deleteFailedDescription: Unable to remove the console right now. Please try again later.
console.deleteInvalidId: Missing binding information, unable to remove.

settings.title: Device Settings
settings.resolutionHint: Select the resolution for the video stream. Higher resolutions require better network connections.
settings.frameRateHint: Select the frame rate for the video stream. Higher frame rates provide smoother experience but require more bandwidth.
settings.bitrateHint: Select the bitrate for the video stream. Higher bitrates provide better quality but require faster network speeds.
settings.streamTypeHint: Choose the codec used for streaming. HEVC delivers better quality at lower bitrates but may not be supported on all devices.
settings.saveSuccessDescription: Device settings have been saved successfully
settings.saveFailedDescription: Unable to save device settings, please try again later
settings.loadFailedDescription: Unable to load device settings, please try again later
settings.resetDescription: Settings have been reset to defaults

deleteSection.title: Remove device binding
deleteSection.description: Remove this console from your account. The console itself will not be affected.

controllerMapping.title: Controller Mapping
controllerMapping.subtitle: Configure keyboard and mouse to controller button mappings

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.step1: Click a button on the controller or in the list below to start mapping
instructions.step2: Press the keyboard key or mouse button you want to map
instructions.step3: Click the Save button to save your mappings after completing them

gamepad.title: Controller Layout
gamepad.description: Click buttons on the controller to map them

buttonList.title: Button List
buttonList.description: You can also map buttons from this list

leftStick.title: Left stick directions
leftStick.description: Customize keyboard keys for the four left stick directions.
leftStick.listeningDescription: Press the key you want to assign to left stick {{direction}}
leftStick.mappingSetDescription: Left stick {{direction}} is now mapped to {{key}}
leftStick.mappingClearedDescription: Mapping for left stick {{direction}} has been cleared

rightStick.title: Right stick
rightStick.description: The right stick follows mouse movement and is read-only.

tester.title: Controller Tester
tester.description: Monitor live input from sticks and buttons.
tester.noGamepad: No controller detected. Please connect one and try again.

rumble.title: Controller vibration
rumble.description: Sync vibration feedback from the console to your local controller.
rumble.toastDisabled: Vibration is currently disabled. Please enable it first.

controllerMapping.listeningDescription: Please press the key you want to map to {{button}}
controllerMapping.saveSuccessDescription: Controller mapping settings have been saved
controllerMapping.saveFailedDescription: Unable to save controller mapping settings, please try again later
controllerMapping.resetDescription: Mappings have been reset to defaults

description.discover: Discover and connect to your PlayStation console
description.bind: Configure device information and complete binding

discover.scanning: Scanning for devices on the network...
discover.scanningHint: Please wait, this may take a few seconds
discover.noDevicesHint: Please ensure your PS console is powered on and connected to the same network
discover.manualIpHint: If you know the device IP address, you can enter it directly to connect

bind.needsRegistrationHint: If this is the first time binding this device, you need to provide Account ID and PIN for registration
bind.accountIdPlaceholder: Enter PSN account ID or click the button to get it
bind.accountIdHint: This is your PSN account ID, usually Base64-encoded 8-byte data. Click the "Get via PSN Login" button to automatically obtain it.
bind.gettingAccountIdHint: Please complete PSN login in the popup window
bind.pinHint: The 8-digit PIN code displayed on your PS console

callbackSteps.title: Instructions
callbackSteps.step1: Complete PSN login in the popup window
callbackSteps.step2: After successful login, the page will redirect to callback address ({domain})
callbackSteps.step3: The system will automatically try to get the callback URL
callbackSteps.step4: If automatic retrieval fails, copy the full URL from the browser address bar (containing {codeParam} parameter) and paste it below
callbackSteps.hint: Tip: You can press {selectKey1} or {selectKey2} to quickly select the address bar, then press {copyKey} to copy

oauth.callbackUrlPlaceholder: Paste the full URL of the PSN callback page (starting with remoteplay.dl.playstation.net)
oauth.callbackUrlInvalid: Please ensure the URL contains "remoteplay.dl.playstation.net" and "code=" parameter
oauth.callbackDetectedHint: Page has redirected, please copy the URL from the address bar (Ctrl+C), then click the ðŸ“‹ button or paste into the input field

errors.ipRequiredHint: Please enter the IP address of the PS console
errors.accountIdAndPinRequiredHint: Device registration requires Account ID and PIN code
errors.bindSuccessHint: Device has been successfully bound to your account
errors.cannotOpenWindowHint: Please allow popup windows and try again
errors.clipboardInvalidHint: Please ensure you have copied the callback URL containing the code= parameter
errors.clipboardReadFailedHint: Please manually paste the URL, or grant clipboard access permission
errors.loginHintDescription: Please complete PSN login in the popup window, the account ID will be automatically retrieved after successful login

state.waitingReady: Waiting for device to be ready...
state.waitingReadyWithTime: Waiting for device to be ready... ({{seconds}}s)

toast.wakingDescription: The device is in standby, waking up...
toast.streamFrozenDescription: Frozen frames: {{frozen}}, recovered: {{recovered}}. Requested a new keyframe.
toast.streamRecoveredDescription: Recovered {{recovered}} frames. Video should resume shortly.
toast.streamRateLimitedDescription: Too many IDR requests in {{window}}s ({{requested}}). Waiting before requesting again.

errors.ipNotSet: Device IP address is not configured
errors.connectRemotePlayFailed: Failed to connect to remote play session
